desc.p: Multi-valued field used to store either a Null value that stands for all currencies or a valid currency.
must contain either a null value that stands for all currencies or a valid currency defined in
Sub-valued field that must stand for a valid day in the corresponding year/month.
The days must be valid for the corresponding year/month and must be specified in ascending order within the associated currency.
When a currency is specified, the system must check if the input day is a working day in the country related to this currency (an override is issued if the input day is not a working day).
The YEARS.MONTH key is an unique identifier to the FD.MATURITY.DATES file.
The key of this file is made of a year in the form YYYY and a month in the form MM,
both being separated by a dot.
